gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 116, Pelicans 95
gameRecap.excerpt: Darius Garland led the Cavaliers with 27 points, six rebounds, and 11 assists as Cleveland defeated New Orleans, 116-95. Jarrett Allen (17 points, 10 rebounds) and Donovan Mitchell (14 points, four rebounds, five assists) totaled 31 for the Cavaliers. Zion Williamson led New Orleans with 33 points and nine rebounds as Brandon Ingram added 20 points, five rebounds, and five assists. Cleveland improves to 42-24 as the Pelicans move to 39-26.
